title: Bug of Darius's skin- Drunk master

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is not only affecting the skin, but also the base. We've gone ahead and disabled Darius until we have a fix for the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=WUZQEEEx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-28T15:25:38.315+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> This is not only affecting the skin, but also the base. We've gone ahead and disabled Darius until we have a fix for the issue.

It's supposed to be fixed now, but it isn't for dunkmaster. I've payed a lot for the dunkmaster skin, and now I can't play it because it gives me a disadvantage.
My laptop is Mac Air, I'm not sure this bug is only happens on Mac or any other computers.

This has nothing to do with the computer or the skin, this is a present bug on Darius, where after he uses his pull, the enemy and himself are unable to move or autoattack. There are other posters who may know more about this then me.
